labels.name: Name
labels.disallowScrimPickupsFromUntrusted: Disallow scrim pickups from untrusted users
bottomTexts.name: Note that if you change your team's name then someone else can claim the name and URL for their team
bottomTexts.tag: Typically used before in-game name to indicate membership of a team (e.g. [TAG] PlayerName)
bottomTexts.disableBuildAbilitySorting: Outside of your profile page, build abilities are sorted so that same abilities are next to each other. This setting allows you to see the abilities in the order they were authored everywhere.
bottomTexts.disallowScrimPickupsFromUntr: Only applies if you are in the lobby as group leader. Other group leaders can still pick you up.
errors.atLeastOneOption: At least one option must be selected
errors.duplicateName: There is already a team with this name
errors.noOnlySpecialCharacters: Name can't be only special characters
placeholders.weaponPoolFull: Pool full - remove a weapon to add more
bottomTexts.buildPrivate: Private builds are only visible to you
errors.gearAllOrNone: Fill all gear slots or leave all empty
bottomTexts.modNote: This note will be only visible to staff members
bottomTexts.scrimStart: Leave to default if you want to look for a scrim now
bottomTexts.scrimStartFlexibility: If set, allow requests for any time between start and end
bottomTexts.scrimManagedByAnyone: If enabled, all users in this post can accept requests and delete the post, not just the owner.
errors.dateInPast: Date can not be in the past
errors.dateTooFarInFuture: Date can not be more than 2 weeks in the future
errors.minUsersExcludingYourself: Must have at least {{min}} users excluding yourself
errors.divBothOrNeither: Both min and max div must be set or neither
errors.tournamentMustBeSelected: Tournament must be selected when maps is tournament
errors.tournamentOnlyWhenMapsIsTournamen: Tournament should only be selected when maps is tournament
errors.visibilityMustBeDifferent: Not found visibility must be different from base visibility
errors.visibilityNotAllowedWhenPublic: Not found visibility can not be set if base visibility is public
errors.dateBeforeScrimDate: Date can not be before the scrim date
errors.canNotSetIfLookingNow: Can not be set if looking for scrim now
bottomTexts.orgMembersInfo: Add yourself as admin to remain in control of this organization
errors.dateMustNotBeFuture: Date must not be in the future
